caption: Spanish, Aragon School?, Half-length Portrait of Monk Holding a Crucifix with Sketches of Decorative Motifs, late 16th–early 17th century. Pen and dark brown ink; 15.4 × 11.7 cm. Museum purchase, Laura P. Hall Memorial Fund and Fowler McCormick, Class of 1921, Fund (2002-104)
